text:
I have a question about the field:

"Create and associate companies with contacts"

In the page:
Settings > Data Management > Objects > Companies > Automation

This option is important for the use case of our users creating new contacts in the HubSpot website. However, this option creates problems when syncing via Api from our database. Is there a way to deactivate this option for Api integration only?

Hi there, HubSpot’s support has sent me here. About *creating deals via Slack*: Is it possible to show the ‘deal description’ in the Slack post that follows after as well? Hope you can help me out, thanks! :pray:
<https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7014346252569985024?updateEntityUrn=urn%3Ali%3Afs_feedUpdate%3A%28V2%2Curn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A7014346252569985024%29>
<https://github.com/rykermorgan/HubSpot/tree/master/ops_hub/custom_slack_notifs>
maybe that helps :slightly_smiling_face:
You'll want to use this api to change properties of a quote: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/quotes> and then to change line items and stuff you'll use the associations api
<@UBT0AHWLD> that post is exactly what came to my mind, too!
the docs on batch create blog tags blog api is really confusing. What do we put in the required translatedfromid param on a non translated tag?

Hello,

When using the v3 Line Items API, I sometimes receive line items that are not associated with a deal. Does this make sense? How would a line item not be associated with a deal? :slightly_smiling_face:

Example:
(Notice: No deal associations returned, even though they were requested.)

```curl -H "Accept: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer ***" <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/line_item/3049134007?associations=deal> ```
```{
  "id": "3049134007",
  "properties": {
    "amount": "0.00",
    "createdate": "2022-05-10T17:34:58.295Z",
    "hs_lastmodifieddate": "2022-05-10T17:34:58.295Z",
    "hs_object_id": "3049134007",
    "hs_product_id": "1390756932",
    "quantity": "1"
  },
  "createdAt": "2022-05-10T17:34:58.295Z",
  "updatedAt": "2022-05-10T17:34:58.295Z",
  "archived": false
}```
You can create a line item and not have it been associated to a deal

Line items created through the UI will always be associated to a deal (unless unassociated via the api) but line items created through the api have to be manually associated (using the api) they aren't automatically associated
FWIW it creates tags without the field… so maybe it shouldn’t be labeled as required?
Ah! That makes sense. Maybe that's why the no-deal line items I've checked have a null HubSpot_owner_id?
Yep that would definitely be the culprit

Hey guys, I'm trying to create a custom object but I'm getting this error: `{"status":"error","message":"Count of Creator object fields has exceeded maximum count of 300","correlationId":"34729fa1...}` it's weird because it creates the object anyway.
Are all the fields on the object?
Also what error code is it giving you? 400?
Yup 400. I'm creating around 300+ properties, I suppose that's the problem.
Very interesting, I've honestly never seen this before. Have you create that object before? Are you just updating the custom object properties or is this a completely new creation?

Yes, I have, didn't get this error the past week. The thing is that I recently update my JSON file with a bunch of properties, I would like to think that's the issue. And yes it's a new creation. Will try to create all the properties later.
Got it, let me know how it goes
It did work, damn I am so happy. At least now we are aware of this limitation.
Hi. I am new to HubSpot. I have a question about companies. What is the unique identifier? Ex: similar to email for contacts.
NM I found it :slightly_smiling_face: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/crm-setup/set-up-your-import-file>

Hi, I am trying to fetch feedback submissions with private app’s access token, it’s working with normal request but when I’m using it inside custom CRM Card, the response is:
```{"status":"error","message":"Authentication credentials not found. This API supports both API Key and OAuth 2.0 authentication and you can find more details at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/auth/oauth-overview>","correlationId":"459ab63f-1fca-4b07-b56e-fdb2a417095e","category":"INVALID_AUTHENTICATION"} 
Request ID: 93391b24-94c4-47d2-a615-a3aa99784092```
Could anyone please help me check this out?
how to get a user`s meeting link using HubSpot API?
